name: "His & His" Antique Silver Tea Spoon Set
description:
"His & Hers" for the 21st Century!

I'm waving my virtual Rainbow Flag and celebrating love within ALL unions with my "His & His" and "Hers & Hers" tea spoon sets. 
The perfect gift for a Civil Partnership or engagement - antique, silver-plated and totally unique.

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨ 
Please note that this is antique & pre-loved, meaning evidence of its previous life and age is visible.

Marks made during the hammering process are expected and spacing & alignment of letters are not exact. It all adds to the whimsical and charming look that My Belle Abode adores.

This is perfectly imperfect. 
¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨

name: Vintage Floral Decoupage Spindle Chair
description:
This is a shabby chic, vintage farmhouse style wooden spindle-back chair.  
Another My Belle Abode original, it has been primed and painted in bright white then painstakingly decoupaged with flowers with a final layer of varnish over the top.  The images were taken from an old book of hand drawn floral illustrations....it is truly beautiful and 100% original.
Would look stunning in a kitchen, dining room or even a little girls bedroom.
An inspiring addition to any home.

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨ 
Please note that this is antique & pre-loved, meaning evidence of its previous life and age is visible.

The wood has areas of gnarling and some splits- neither of these affect the chair nor detract from from its beauty. It all adds to the whimsical and charming look that My Belle Abode adores.

This is perfectly imperfect. 
¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨

name: Antique Sweet Oil Bottle
description:
Antique medicine bottle: 
"Best Sweet Oil"

So versatile - use as a fragrant reed diffuser, pen pot or even make-up brush holder.

Really rare, totally unique and very pretty

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨ 
Please note that this is antique & pre-loved, meaning evidence of its previous life and age is visible.

There may be signs of wear or blemishes but it all adds to the whimsical and charming look that My Belle Abode adores.

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨

name: Large Upcycled Serving Tray Chalkboard
description:
This vintage, silver serving tray had seen better days...it must have spent its early years waiting hand & foot on its aristicratic household. Not now! My Belle Abode rescued it from a life of spilt coffee and transformed it into the most beautiful chalkboard!
Perfect to hang on the wall & use for shopping lists, or to put on the dining room table with a menu on...OR add a bit of vintage style to your wedding and use this as your 'Top Table' sign! 

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨ 
Please note that this is vintage & pre-loved, meaning evidence of its previous life and age may be visible.

It all adds to the whimsical and charming look that My Belle Abode adores.

This is perfectly imperfect. 
¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨

name: Pair of Vintage French Farmhouse Glass Egg Cups
description:
Say "Bon Matin" to these two vintage French egg cups!
With their farmhouse style ink-blue glass, they will add a certain je ne sais quoi to your breakfast table.

Made in France, sourced in England

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨ 
Please note that these are antique & pre-loved, meaning evidence of their previous life and age is visible.

There may be signs of wear or blemishes but it all adds to the whimsical and charming look that My Belle Abode adores.

These are perfectly imperfect.
